articles.title: US military officials in Kyiv as Europe warns against reported Russia peace plan - BBC
articles.description: It comes after reports the US and Russia have prepared a 28-point peace plan, allegedly with major concessions from Ukraine.
articles.content:
Paul Kirby,Europe digital editor
Senior Pentagon officials have arrived in Ukraine to "discuss efforts to end the war" with Russia, the US military has said.
The team, led by US Army Secretary Dan … [+4944 chars]
